TITLE: Jim Cramer's five factors that could improve market conditions and help interest rates peak
SUMMARY: "All of these things will eventually create an investible moment," Cramer said. "Until then, though, even the moves of the best stocks are just a trade."

SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer said Tuesday investors may be wise to hold off on buying until after the next interest rate hike.

SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer said oil stocks are increasing in value thanks to two major oil company mergers as well as the rising price of crude.

TITLE: Jim Cramer urges patience before buying stocks this week. Here's why

TITLE: Jim Cramer’s guide to investing: Don’t assume market action always makes sense
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer told investors market action doesn't always make sense.

TITLE: Jim Cramer’s guide to investing: Tune in to CEOs
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer told investors they should pay attention to and scrutinize what CEOs say about their companies.

TITLE: Jim Cramer’s guide to investing: Don’t get hung up on what could have been
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer told investors not to obsess over their mistakes.

TITLE: Jim Cramer’s guide to investing: Be flexible
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer reminded investors they must be flexible when owning individual stocks in a market that's inherently changeable.

TITLE: Jim Cramer’s guide to investing: Use good judgment and know your objectives
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer stressed the importance of using proper judgment when investing in individual stocks.

TITLE: Cramer's guide to investing: Never subsidize losers, sell them
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer is teaching investors how to handle their losing stocks.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Make sure you can explain your portfolio to an actual person
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer said that to build a successful portfolio, it is imperative investors can understand and explain all their stock picks.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Prepare for corrections, they are inevitable
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer said investors always need to be prepared for corrections, because like they rain, they are unavoidable.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Don't forget about bonds
SUMMARY: When investing in the stock market, you should always keep your eye on the bond market, CNBC's Jim Cramer said.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Quality is key and patience is a virtue
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer is sharing his essential investing tips. On Tuesday, he stressed the importance of patience and quality when it comes to choosing stocks.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Don't be greedy
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer is sharing his basic tips for investing. One of his first and most essential rules is to not be greedy.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Never buy all at once
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer has bought and sold tons of shares of stock over the years and said investors should never buy all at once.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Do the homework
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer is telling investors they must do their homework if they want to have a successful stock portfolio.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Panic is not a strategy
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer wants investors to know that panicking is not a strategy on the stock market.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's guide to investing: Don't own too many stocks
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer told investors to make sure they don't own too many stocks for their portfolio.
